============
Glean Parser
============




Parser tools for Mozilla's glean telemetry.



Features
--------

* TODO

Requirements
------------

- Python 3.7 (or later)

The following library requirements are installed automatically when glean_parser
is installed by `pip`.

- Click
- PyYAML
- jsonschema
- inflection
- Jinja2
